title: oc 6.0.0a download/share links do not show
body:
### expected behaviour
the share link should display on hover over a folder or file

### actual behaviour
no link is displayed

### steps to reproduce
1. login
2. hover over a directory or file

i have noticed that sometimes after i open a sub-directory, then go back to home, the links appear, but not everytime.

### server configuration
operating system:
centos 6

web server: 
nginx

database:
mysql

php version:
5.4.20

owncloud version: (see owncloud admin page)
6.0.0a

updated from an older owncloud or fresh install:
updated from 5.0.13
